concerns.description: Automatic data collection without explicit user consent
concerns.reasoning: The attention tracking feature was opt-out, meaning users were automatically subjected to data collection without needing their explicit consent, raising privacy concerns.
related_questions: What data was collected without consent?
Were there any notifications provided to users regarding data collection?

concerns.description: Accuracy and relevance of attention tracking data
concerns.reasoning: The method of tracking attention by checking if the application was in focus may not accurately reflect participant engagement or attentiveness.
related_questions: How accurate was the attention tracking data in reflecting actual participant engagement?
Were there any efforts to validate the relevance of this data?

concerns.description: Security measures for collected attention tracking data
concerns.reasoning: There is no mention of specific security measures implemented to protect the attention tracking data, which could pose a risk to user privacy.
related_questions: What security measures were in place to protect attention tracking data?
Were there any incidents of data breaches related to this feature?

concerns.description: Lack of transparency regarding attention tracking practices
concerns.reasoning: The automatic nature of the feature and its subsequent removal due to backlash suggest a lack of transparency in informing users about the practices.
related_questions: How were users informed about the attention tracking feature?
What information was provided to users about data handling practices?

concerns.description: Inability for users to control or delete their attention tracking data
concerns.reasoning: Users were not given the ability to opt-in, withdraw consent, or delete their attention tracking data, indicating a lack of control over their personal data.
related_questions: What options were available for users to manage their attention tracking data?
Could users request deletion of their data while the feature was active?

concerns.description: Lack of accountability mechanisms for attention tracking data
concerns.reasoning: The backlash and removal of the feature suggest potential gaps in accountability regarding user privacy and data protection.
related_questions: Who was responsible for overseeing the attention tracking feature?
Were there any accountability measures in place for data handling?
